channel.title: Quotes on DevOps Website
channel.description: Recent content in Quotes on DevOps Website

item.title: Stein Inge Morisbak on Delivery
item.description: Any roles involved in a project that do not directly contribute toward the goal of putting valuable software in the hands of users as quickly as possible should be carefully considered.

item.title: Scott Hanselman on Automation
item.description: The most powerful tool we have as developers is automation.
